title: MF icon with Payback bundle gives no profile background

embed.description: Grab seriously instant screenshots, screen GIFs, and webpage captures. Get the free app for Windows or Mac to streamline your visual sharing and bookmarking today.

body: So the unique icon gives no ultimate background, and the 4 icons that do, grant them however the issue is her face is still faded and out of view. These issues were resolved on the PBE before her release so is it safe to say these issues will be fixed soon?

replies.body: Hey! This is 100% a bug and we're working to get a fix into the client ASAP!
Funny, I literally also just posted this same bug. It would be really scummy if they didnt allow the bundle exclusive (and only good icon) to use the background

Related threads, go upvote them as well to increase chances that this will be hotfixed ASAP!

[Why does MF icon in GGMF bundle does not give you new profile look?](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/5EVbvA19-why-does-mf-icon-in-ggmf-bundle-does-not-give-you-new-profile-look)
[[CLIENT] Gun Goddess Miss Fortune Limited Bundle Portrait Icon Doesn't Change Profile Background](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/vAeQwsQ6-client-gun-goddess-miss-fortune-limited-bundle-portrait-icon-doesnt-change-profile-background)
